item.title: 得益于强劲的财富管理和利息收入，Truist 第三季度利润上升
item.description: 受强劲的财富管理业务和利息收入增加的推动，Truist Financial 周五公布第三季度利润增长，股价在盘前交易中上涨 2%。【原文：Truist Financial reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Friday, driven by a strong wealth management segment and increased interest income, sending its shares up 2% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 汇丰银行预计黄金 "牛浪 "将于 2026 年达到 5,000 美元/盎司
item.description: 汇丰银行周五预测，黄金的牛市涨势将推动金价在2026年达到每盎司5,000美元，风险升高和新进入市场者的影响将对金价形成支撑。【原文：HSBC on Friday forecast that gold's bull rally would drive prices as high as $5,000 an ounce in 2026, supported by elevated risks and the impact of new entrants into the market.】

item.title: Stellantis 和 Pony.ai 将在欧洲开发自动驾驶汽车
item.description: Stellantis 和中国自动驾驶公司 Pony.ai 周五表示，双方已签署协议，将在欧洲联合开发和测试自动驾驶汽车。【原文：Stellantis and Chinese autonomous driving firm Pony.ai said on Friday that they had signed an agreement to jointly develop and test self-driving vehicles in Europe.】

item.title: 第五第三银行利润因手续费收入而大幅增长，因 Tricolor 破产而亏损 1.78 亿美元
item.description: 美国地区性银行 Fifth Third Bancorp 周五报告称，由于手续费收入强劲，第三季度利润飙升 14%，但因汽车经销商 Tricolor 破产而出现 1.78 亿美元的亏损。【原文：U.S. regional bank Fifth Third Bancorp reported a 14% jump in third-quarter profit on Friday on the back of robust fee income, but booked a $178 million loss related to the bankruptcy of auto dealer Tricolor.】

item.title: Regions Financial 第三季度利润因交易复苏而增长
item.description: 受惠于资本市场走强和利息收入增加，Regions Financial 周五公布第三季度利润增长，股价在盘前交易中上涨约 1%。【原文：Regions Financial reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Friday, benefiting from stronger capital markets and higher income from interests, sending its shares up about 1% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 波士顿科学公司斥资 5.33 亿美元收购 Nalu Medical 的全部所有权
item.description: 医疗设备制造商波士顿科学公司（Boston Scientific）周五表示，将以约5.33亿美元现金收购私人控股公司纳鲁医疗公司（Nalu Medical）的剩余股权，从而扩大其对慢性疼痛的治疗范围。【原文：Medical device maker Boston Scientific said on Friday it will buy the remaining equity in privately held Nalu Medical for about $533 million in cash, expanding its treatments for chronic pain.】

item.title: 美国运通押注富裕客户假日消费，更新 2025 年预测
item.description: 美国运通周五上调了 2025 年利润和收入预期的下限，原因是其富裕客户看淡了经济不确定性，继续在假日季前消费。【原文：American Express raised the lower end of its 2025 profit and revenue forecasts on Friday, as its affluent customers looked past economic uncertainty and continued spending ahead of the holiday season.】

item.title: ETF 市场快速增长引发泡沫担忧
item.description: 美国交易所交易基金市场正以前所未有的速度不断涌现新产品，引发了对泡沫发展的担忧--导致一些投资者对支持哪些基金变得更加挑剔，并质疑有多少基金能存活下来。【原文：The U.S. exchange-traded fund market is churning out new products at an unprecedented clip, creating concerns about a bubble developing - causing some investors to become more selective about which funds to support and question how many can survive.】

item.title: SLB 第三季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周五，由于北美市场对油田设备和服务的需求高于预期，SLB 第三季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：SLB beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Friday, helped by higher-than-expected demand for its oilfield equipment and services in North America.】

item.title: 早间竞标信用风险依然存在
item.description: 迈克-多兰（Mike Dolan）和投资回报率团队周末兴奋地阅读、观看和收听的所有内容。【原文：Everything Mike Dolan and the ROI team are excited to read, watch and listen to over the weekend.】

item.title: 杰富瑞称与 First Brands 倒闭有关的基金与投行业务分离
item.description: 杰富瑞银行（Jefferies）的高层管理人员在该行的投资者日上表示，杰富瑞在汽车零部件制造商 First Brands 倒闭事件中设立的基金与其投资银行业务是分开的。【原文：Jefferies' fund caught up in the collapse of auto parts maker First Brands is separate from its investment banking business, its top executives said at the bank's investor day.】

item.title: 汽车设备供应商 Autoliv 第三季度营业利润超出预期
item.description: 周五，全球最大的安全气囊和安全带生产商 Autoliv 公布的第三季度调整后营业利润高于市场预期，并称该公司已在本季度收回了约 75% 的关税相关成本。【原文：Autoliv , the world's largest producer of airbags and seatbelts, reported a third-quarter adjusted operating profit above market expectations on Friday and said it had recovered around 75% of the tariff-related costs in the quarter.】

item.title: 中国发布个人数据出口新规
item.description: 中国监管机构周四发布了关于个人信息跨境传输认证的新规定，要求 "非关键信息基础设施运营商 "在进行某些数据传输前申请认证。【原文：Chinese regulators on Thursday released new rules on certifying cross-border transfers of personal information, requiring "non-critical information infrastructure operators" to apply for certifications before certain data transfers can be made.】

item.title: 小米股价创 3 年半以来最差一周，事故引发电动汽车安全担忧
item.description: 据媒体报道，中国电动汽车制造商小米本周发生了两起涉及其最畅销车型的事故，导致其股价周五创下逾三年半以来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：Shares of Chinese EV maker Xiaomi suffered their biggest weekly loss in more than 3-1/2 years on Friday, after media reported two separate accidents involving its best-selling model this week.】

item.title: 消息人士称，由于大豆价格低迷，ADM 试图吸引美国农民销售大豆
item.description: 全球最大的谷物贸易商之一阿彻丹尼尔米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland）的一位谷物贸易商和公司的一位知情员工称，由于低价大豆使种植者的销售放缓，该公司正在为美国农民本月向其一家主要加工厂交付大豆提供激励措施。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland , one of the world's biggest grain merchants, is offering incentives for U.S. farmers to deliver soybeans to one of its major processing facilities this month as low prices have slowed selling by growers, a grain trader and a company employee with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 特斯拉、Netflix 和延迟发布的 CPI 报告将给震荡的市场带来考验
item.description: 特斯拉（Tesla）和 Netflix 为首的公司发布的财报将在未来一周更深入地揭示美国企业的利润状况，而推迟发布的美国通胀数据将是对股市的又一次考验。【原文：Earnings reports from companies led by Tesla and Netflix will provide a deeper look at U.S. corporate profits in the coming week, and a delayed U.S. inflation release will mark another test for the stock market, which has become shakier even as it remains around record highs.】

item.title: 地区银行不良贷款令投资者紧张，华尔街期货下跌
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货暴跌，因为对风险和信贷质量恶化的担忧加剧，引发了地区性银行的抛售，进一步削弱了受中美贸易紧张局势影响的投资者信心。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slumped on Friday as mounting concerns over risks and deteriorating credit quality triggered a selloff in regional banks, further weakening investor confidence strained by U.S.-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称日本顶级银行将联合发行稳定币
item.description: 据《日经商业日报》周五报道，日本三大银行--三菱日联金融集团、三井住友金融集团和瑞穗金融集团将联合发行 "稳定币"，即与现实世界货币价值挂钩的数字货币。【原文：Japan's three largest banks, Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group , Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group and Mizuho Financial Group , will jointly issue "stablecoins", digital currencies pegged to the value of real-world currencies, the Nikkei business daily reported on Friday.】

item.title: 芒果时装大亨的家人表示相信儿子在凶杀案调查中是无辜的
item.description: 10 个月前在巴塞罗那附近坠崖身亡的芒果公司创始人伊萨克-安迪奇（Isak Andic）的家人表示，他们相信他的儿子乔纳森是无辜的，因为几家当地媒体报道说，他们正在对乔纳森可能涉嫌他杀进行正式调查。【原文：The family of Mango founder Isak Andic, who died in a fall from a cliff near Barcelona 10 months ago, said it was confident his son Jonathan was innocent after several local media reported he was being officially investigated for possible homicide.】

item.title: 星巴克投资者敦促公司重启工会谈判
item.description: 纽约市主计长办公室网站周四发布的一封信显示，星巴克的长期股东已致信该公司，要求其与工会恢复谈判，讨论人员配备、工资和其他问题。【原文：Long-term Starbucks shareholders have written to the company to resume talks with its workers union to discuss staffing, wages and other issues, a letter posted Thursday on the New York City Comptroller's website showed.】

item.title: 法国 200 亿美元电信竞标可能考验欧盟决心
item.description: 布依格电信公司（Bouygues Telecom）、伊利亚特公司（Iliad）旗下的 Free 公司和 Orange 公司以 170 亿欧元（197.2 亿美元）联合竞购法国第二大电信运营商 SFR 的大部分资产，这可能是对欧洲电信市场的一次严峻考验。【原文：A 17 billion euro ($19.72 billion) joint bid by Bouygues Telecom , Iliad-owned Free and Orange for most of the assets of France's second-largest telecoms operator SFR could prove an acid test for Europe's telecoms market.】

item.title: 韩国启动武器博览会，展示无人驾驶和人工智能武器
item.description: 韩国将于本周五举办有史以来规模最大的武器展，预计将有公司展示从榴弹炮到自杀式无人机等新型无人驾驶和人工智能增强型武器。【原文：South Korea kicked off its largest-ever arms fair on Friday, with firms expected to show off new unmanned and artificial intelligence-enhanced weapons from howitzers to suicide drones, as Seoul seeks to strengthen its military and pursues more global defence sales.】

item.title: 福特因摄像头显示屏和安全带问题召回近62.5万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周五表示，由于安全带和后视摄像头显示问题，福特将在美国召回近62.5万辆汽车。【原文：Ford is recalling nearly 625,000 vehicles in the U.S. due to seatbelt and rear view camera display problems, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Friday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价在特朗普誓言减肥药降价后下跌 5
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四表示将降低这家丹麦制药商最畅销减肥药的价格后，诺和诺德公司的股价在周五早盘交易中下跌了约5%。【原文：Novo Nordisk's shares fell around 5% in early trade on Friday after U.S. President Donald Trump said on Thursday that the price of the Danish drugmaker's best-selling weight-loss drug would be lowered.】

item.title: Meta AI 眼镜推动收入增长，雷朋制造商 EssilorLuxottica 股价大涨
item.description: 周五早盘，雷朋（Ray-Ban）制造商依视路（EssilorLuxottica）股价大涨逾 9%，一天前，这家法意集团公布的季度营收好于预期，这得益于其 Meta AI 眼镜的强劲需求。【原文：Shares of Ray-Ban maker EssilorLuxottica surged more than 9% in early trading on Friday after the Franco-Italian group reported better than expected quarterly revenue a day earlier, helped by strong demand for its Meta AI glasses.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，可口可乐考虑以 10 亿美元对印度装瓶部门进行 IPO
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，可口可乐公司正在考虑将其印度装瓶部门印度斯坦可口可乐饮料公司（Hindustan Coca-Cola Beverages）上市，交易价格可能达到 10 亿美元。【原文：Coca-Cola is considering taking its Indian bottling unit, Hindustan Coca-Cola Beverages, public in a deal that may fetch $1 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Cellnex 以 3.91 亿欧元出售法国数据中心部门
item.description: 西班牙 Cellnex 公司周五表示，该公司已签署认沽期权协议，以 3.91 亿欧元（4.58 亿美元）的价格将其持有的法国 Towerlink 公司 99.99% 的股份全部出售给 Vauban Infra Fibre 公司。【原文：Spain's Cellnex said on Friday that it has signed a put option agreement to sell all its 99.99% share capital in Towerlink France to Vauban Infra Fibre for 391 million euros ($458 million).】

item.title: Take Five：谁是始作俑者？
item.description: 美国政府停摆又持续了一周，财报季正在如火如荼地进行，中美贸易关系紧张，还有大量数据值得仔细斟酌。【原文：The U.S. government shutdown extends into another week, earnings season is in full swing, U.S./China trade tensions are tense and there's plenty of data to mull over.】

item.title: 关税过山车促使中国出口商 "放弃 "美国
item.description: 在美国反复无常的关税声明所造成的混乱中，生产从厨房用具到万圣节装饰品等各种产品的中国出口商做出了回应，向欧洲、拉丁美洲、中东和非洲的买家出售了更多商品。【原文：Amid the chaos of erratic U.S. tariff announcements, Chinese exporters making everything from kitchen appliances to Halloween decorations have responded by selling more goods to buyers in Europe, Latin America, the Middle East and Africa.】

item.title: 爱马仕设计师 Veronique Nichanian 在 37 年后离职
item.description: 爱马仕周五证实，爱马仕男装艺术总监 Veronique Nichanian 在品牌工作 37 年后即将离职。【原文：Veronique Nichanian, artistic director of menswear styles at Hermes , is departing after 37 years at the brand, Hermes confirmed on Friday.】
